summary: This Hong Kong martial-arts extravaganza tells of evil emperors and true love. The secret Red Lotus Flower Society is committed to the overthrow of the evil Manchu Emperor and his minions. ... See full summary Â»
cast: Jet Li|Josephine Siao|Michelle Reis|Wenzhuo Zhao|Sung Young Chen|Sibelle Hu|Adam Cheng|Kong Chu|Lung Chan|Xian Gao|Tao Guo|Yueming Pan|Yankai Yu|Bing Lei Li
title: La leyenda de Fong Sai Yuk
